cont.entity_a: Requires SD card for additional memory. Upgradeable with an SD card. Expandable memory with SD card.
Straightforward to use. Controls are easy to learn but not intuitive. Navigation is somewhat clunky and lacks organization by folder.
Uses replaceable AAA battery. Battery life is good. Reliability issues with units not turning on after battery replacement.
cont.entity_b: Rechargeable via USB port. Battery retention mechanism is delicate. Battery life is long and replaceable. USB charging reduces battery waste.

cont.entity_a: Comes with accessories including sync cable, protective case, armband, and in-ear earphones.
Includes an FM receiver. FM tuner works well.
cont.entity_b: Includes a built-in microphone and radio player. FM reception is excellent. FM recording only makes WAV files.

cont.entity_a: Sound quality is better than expected with equalizer adjustments. Good sound quality and easy navigation. Earphones provided have poor sound quality.
cont.entity_b: Sound quality is good with personal headphones. Headphones included are not comfortable.
Buttons and display are difficult to use.

cont.entity_a: Cannot create playlists, manual song selection required. Does not support bookmarking for audiobooks.
cont.entity_b: No special software required for file transfer.
Customer service issues with warranty claims.
